isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - MAINTENANCE - COOLING

svcproc.title: COOLING
svcproc.para:
Every 6 months, 1800 operating hours or after each 50,000 miles (80,450 km) (whichever occurs first),
inspect the compressor discharge port, inlet cavity and discharge line for evidence of restrictions and carboning. If excessive buildup is noted, thoroughly clean or replace the affected parts and closely inspect the compressor cooling system. Check all compressor coolant lines for kinks and restrictions to flow. Minimum coolant line size is 3/8" I.D. Check coolant lines for internal clogging from rust scale. If coolant lines look irregular, check the coolant flow and compare to SPECIFICATIONS. Carefully inspect the air induction system for restrictions.
